name: Requiem (itch) (Austin Michaud)
description:
This is a game my team and I made for school. Its a horror stealth game set in space. Your goal is to escape your corrupted crewmembers and find a way off the ship.

Design - Austin Michaud, Levi Elliot Smith

Art - Levi Elliot Smith, Jordan Little, Timmothy Tapia

Code - Nicholas Martin, Jordan Little, Austin Michaud
